entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:58 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 6:21 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.1°C

Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 97 %

Dewpoint: -1.5°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain this evening then to snow before morning. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 5:15 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:15 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
